name: Elements (JackWilDesign)
description:
A game by Jack Wilson and Max Cussans.

Controlls - 

Numpad 1,2.3 & Enter will switch between the elements. 

Space to jump

Pad controls:

Bumper and triggers to switch elements

A?bottom face button to jump (Only confirmed to work with a 360 controller)

Master the power of fire, earth water and air to traverse difficult levels.

This is a tough platformer that will make challenge you to think about how to overcome obstacles using a set of tight mechanics. 

Design by Jack Wilson

Code by Max Cussans

Art (Not present in current build) Will be done by Elliott Oldham

This is an early version of the build which is mechanically complete but missing some levels and a lot of the polish, including final art and audio.

This is our first project and we would love to get some feedback on what you liked and what you did not!
